channel.title: Please help , connection problem! [ URGENT ]
channel.description:
After I opened my 43594 pot CORRECTLY and setted up DynDns ( It's the same as no-ip , just another dns program that I prefer ) I have ANOTHER login problem.
Finally my source shows that people are trying to connect but it rejects them , I tryed a different client but still the same problem , here is a picture of what the source window showing :
[URL=http://www.siz.co.il/][IMG]http://up192.siz.co.il/up1/rn4ouwnkjdfj.jpg[/img][/URL]
I really think its a client problem , if its a server problem please movie it to server help , sorry :)
Thanks , Danny![br][br][size=1]Posted on: December 18, 2009, 10:34:23 am[/size][hr]Sorry for the double post but PLEASE , answer me , it's urgent , I really wanna release my server !!
